text: Brigitte Nielsen (born July 15, 1963) is a Danish model and movie actress. She has performed in many movies. She is also a television personality who is involved with reality shows. ==Personal life== Nielsen has been married five times and has four sons. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Modeling (profession) Category:Reality television participants Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Brigitte Nielsen
